item.title: r/NoMansSkyTheGame
item.description:
After loading him up with some basic resources to save him from farming, we bounced around and I followed him along on his first few tutorial missions.

He fixed his starship, we took off, and after getting the signal needed to land on another planet and build something.

While heâ€™s doing so a sentinal rolls inâ€¦

I freeze.

Heâ€™s off trying to navigate menus somewhereâ€¦

Sentinal activates. Scatter blast a few pumpsâ€¦ Moving on.

Reinforcements incomingâ€¦

Still navigating menus in the distanceâ€¦

Me dancing around a sentinal dog reloading my scatter blasterâ€¦

â€œHow do I make dihydrogen jelly?â€

BLASTING AWAY â€œOPEN YOUR EXOSUIT MENU AND PRESS CRAFT ON AN OPEN SLOTâ€ BLAST BLAST, BOOT BOOST TURN AND BLAST.

â€œBro, we gotta leaveâ€¦ Nowâ€¦â€

What the hell are you doing?

â€œSentinel walker incomingâ€

â€œBro just get in your ship we gotta leave, they wonâ€™t stopâ€

â€œWell you gotta figure that KZZZTT out cause I donâ€™t even know why menu Iâ€™m inâ€

WALKER BEAM COMES BLASTING THROUGH MY FACE ğŸ˜

â€œOKAY, UMMâ€¦ WELL TAKE COVER OR SOMETHING OR GET I YOUR SHIP CAUSE THIS THING IS GOING TO LITERALLY KILL YOU. YOUâ€™RE JUST A FRAGILE LITTLE BABY INTERLOPER.â€

I proceed to dance around this walker taking off pieces of armor one by one. Just thanking myself in the back of my head for buying that life support module before grouping upâ€¦ Eventually it goes Kzzt and hits the floor. Walker brain in suit inventory.

Okay letâ€™s go.

Zoot into space and of course, a subspace scan and the sentinal FLEET converges on us. 5 off the top and then 6 more on a second wave.

(Him without knowing how to repair his weapons ğŸ˜¦ watching me zip around blasting sentinals)

They backed off and we shot back down to the surfaceâ€¦

Coincidentally IN THE SAME EXACT SPOT AND GUESS WHO WAS WAITING FOR US.

Another walker.

His portable refiner is on the ground and needs to pick it up so I land and get to blasting this walkerâ€¦.

More blasting. Get the plating off and going at the brainâ€¦

And thenâ€¦

ZAP ZAP ZAP OUT OF NOWHWHERE and my bro comes flying in taking down the walker WITH HIS STARSHIP. He fixed it and saved the freaking day.

I blast open the capsule and transfer the walker brain to his inventory.

Hereâ€¦ Youâ€™ll need this later.

Iâ€™m so proud. ğŸ˜­
